channel.title: Images on Kiera
channel.description: Recent content in Images on Kiera

item.title: Feature Image
item.description: The Hugo Kiera theme now supports featured images. To use the feature, set the images parameter in a page's frontmatter. (Note that this is required to be an array, even though only the first image is used.
